inventory=[{"type": "white_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "emerald", "quantity": 9, "index": 12}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 11, "index": 28}, {"type": "dragon_head", "quantity": 7, "index": 30}, {"type": "yellow_wool", "quantity": 7, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft an emerald block, I need to place 9 emeralds in a 3x3 square on the crafting grid. The first emerald is placed in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
